greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-3) + a(n-4), n >= 4.
comment: See comment and FAMP code for A111569.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 0, 1, 1).
mathematica: LinearRecurrence[{1,0,1,1},{1,1,-2,-1},40] (* or *) CoefficientList[ Series[ (-1+3*x^2)/((1+x^2)*(x^2+x-1)),{x,0,40}],x]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 23 2011 *)
program: Floretion Algebra Multiplication Program, FAMP Code: 1jesseq[B+H] with B = - .25'i + .25'j - .25i' + .25j' + k' - .5'kk' - .25'ik' - .25'jk' - .25'ki' - .25'kj' - .5e and H = + .75'ii' + .75'jj' + .75'kk' + .75e
results.author: _Creighton Dement_, Aug 10 2005
